item.description: Comedy Rules! This is a co-event with the Movie & Pints Group. We'll meet at Jacob Wirth's in Chinatown after the Movie to have a few and laugh about the movie. This is Alicia's group and this is her link, she is very Cool: http://www.meetup.com/CraftBeerCrew/calendar/10789310/?success=rsvpYesOrgCreateGroup Couples Retreat Vince Vaughn, Jason Bateman, Jon Favreau, Malin Akerman, Kristin Davis, Kristen Bell and Faizon Love star in Universal Pictures’ upcoming comedy Couples Retreat. Based on an original idea of Vaughn’s, the comedy follows four Midwestern couples who embark on a journey to a tropical island resort. While one of the couples is there to work on their marriage, the other three set out to jet ski, spa and enjoy some fun in the sun. They soon discover that participation in the resort’s couples therapy is not optional. Suddenly, their group-rate vacation comes at a price. What follows is a hilarious look at real world problems faced by all couples. The film also stars Kali Hawk and Jean Reno. Genre:Comedy Director:Peter Billingsley Cast:Vince Vaughn, Jason Bateman, Jon Favreau, Faizon Love, Kristin Davis, Malin Akerman, Kristen Bell
item.name: Couples Retreat
